summary: I think that Sansa is so disliked because she's not a Fantasy character. True, ASOIF is a Fantasy series but it was also...
body:
I think that Sansa is so disliked because she’s not a Fantasy character. True, ASOIF is a Fantasy series but it was also inspired by History and historical novels. Sansa is a character you could find in those. So, of course, Fantasy fanboys are annoyed. Can’t wait to see her win the game…  because:

1. She deserves it.

2. She was born for the job, even Tyrion thinks so.

3. To piss the haters off.

tags: remade this cause the original was......bad
summary: saddest asoiaf quotes [11/?] Already the snowfall lay thick upon the garden below, blanketing the grass, dusting the shrubs and...
caption:
saddest asoiaf quotes [11/?]

Already the snowfall lay thick upon the garden below, blanketing the grass, dusting the shrubs and statues with white and weighing down the branches of the trees. The sight took Sansa back to cold nights long ago, in the long summer of her childhood.

She had last seen snow the day she’d left Winterfell. That was a lighter fall than this, she remembered. Robb had melting flakes in his hair when he hugged me, and the snowball Arya tried to make kept coming apart in her hands. It hurt to remember how happy she had been that morning. Hullen had helped her mount, and she’d ridden out with the snowflakes swirling around her, off to see the great wide world. I thought my song was beginning that day, but it was almost done.

summary: From now on I’m referring to all the Sansa haters as the mirror cats.  It keeps my blood pressure manageable, it makes me laugh...
body:
From now on I’m referring to all the Sansa haters as the mirror cats. It keeps my blood pressure manageable, it makes me laugh and IT’S TRUE.

Like cats, they look in the mirror (and see all that hatred and misogyny and sexism oh my!) and confuse their own reflection for an enemy. Like mirror cats, there is a lot of projection going on with this lot. I’m not going to tag them in—not even as antis—you all know who they are.

MIRROR CATS

I’m Muslim brown and an immigrant

summary: Ah! 😣 Jonsa got me real good. I never expected it I didn’t see it coming it has consumed my heart. Initially I loved d’s...
body: Ah! 😣 Jonsa got me real good. I never expected it I didn’t see it coming it has consumed my heart. Initially I loved d’s 👩🏻‍🦳character I didn’t ship her with anyone really I didn’t even mourn drogos death I was kinda relieved for her. I never thought I would ship her with Jon I never thought I would ship Sansa with Jon. I was just minding my own business watching a show that had awesome stories that were complex and that’s it. AND THEN IT HAPPENED. Sansa 👩🏻‍🦰went to castle 🏰 black because Jon 🧔🏻 was there and then the epic hug 😒 ok that was a tear jerker I mean they never even shared a scene together but they are both coming out of traumatic experiences. I was so happy for them and it was a breath of fresh air and it was super emotional. Wow look at them they look so happy and comfortable wow 😯 the chemistry is thick they are brother and sister right. Right!? 🧐😏 ok we are entering some taboo territory here. But here’s the kicker it never felt weird. I wanted them together now. I loved the angst I loved them going back and forth. I loved that they were getting a feel for one another and building that trust. It was beautiful to watch and then u have the parentage reveal and it’s oh so sweet because these dorks don’t see it coming but we do or at least some of us do. Some folks choose to look over all this and jump for D but there’s a reason all of this happened before he met her. Every interaction we see with Jon and D is now compared to Jon and Sansa and it just can’t come close. Even a bloody boat bang couldn’t hurt my jonsa feelings because it felt empty it felt like sex “blandcest” to be exact. Credit to the jonsa that came up with that term because I absolutely love it. It describes boat bang accurately. For the record I started watching GOT after coming across sansan gifs here on tumblr and I expected to love Sansa but that first season I disliked her and loved D. So that’s the story glory. Sansa Stark is the most under appreciated character on GOT and its baffling. She is the hero. She played a crucial part in bringing down ramsay and LF. I mean how could u just ignore that. Any who sucks to be all y’all missing half the story here but it’s ur loss. I was with D up until dragonstone. Something changed and then the tarlys happened and I just couldn’t anymore and I couldn’t want Jon to be with someone I couldn’t root for. Yet I love my dragons 🐉 🐉 🐉 I love their scenes. They truly do stir up awe and amazement. I know they are dangerous but I love them still. What rubs me the wrong way is you call them your children cause I feel like they are mine too but u are using them to gain a kingdom u feel entitled too. So u will put them in harms way to get what u want. I don’t know this doesn’t sit right with me. Every time she says they are her children I side eye that because you don’t treat them like it and it sounds hypocritical. Actions speak louder than words and what I hear her say and what I see her do is two different things. This is my reasoning for not following her. My moral compass and heart just couldn’t. So I didn’t just dislike her because she was messing with my ship. She is a morally flawed character but a lot of folks are ride or die and that’s ok.

summary: Could Sansa be the one to outmanoeuvre and kill Cersei?
title: Could Sansa be the one to outmanoeuvre and kill Cersei?
body:
She told Lady Olenna the truth about Joffrey… leading to his death.

She fed Ramsey Bolten… to his dogs.

She had Petyr Baelish charged with treason… and executed.

So that’s three of her abusers that she’s destroyed… so why not a forth?

reblog.comment:

summary: It’s confirmed. Sansa’s season 8 hair isn’t influenced by Danaerys. I noticed that she’s been wearing that since season 7. Now...
body:
Sophie Turner and James Hibberd on Sansa’s Hair

It’s confirmed. Sansa’s season 8 hair isn’t influenced by Danaerys. I noticed that she’s been wearing that since season 7. Now it’s confirmed by Sophie Turner and James Hibberd. (See full report here.)

And that’s the tea.

tags: a song of ice and fire
summary: A strange thought has just appeared in my mind!  When I was watching this scene before I only interpreted Littlefinger's words...
caption:
A strange thought has just appeared in my mind! 

When I was watching this scene before I only interpreted Littlefinger’s words being about  that prostitute whose name I don’t remember (“Many who try to climb it fail and never get to try again. The fall breaks them. ”), Sansa (“And some are given a chance to climb, but they refuse. They cling to the realm or the gods or love. Illusions. ”) and Jon (“Only the ladder is real. The climb is all there is.”). Which is kind of obvious. 

BUT!  This could actually be a foreshadowing of Joffrey’s death (he tried to be a King and was poisoned, so the fall broke him), Shae’s death (she was given a chance to leave King’s Landing by ship too! And she was cling to love, not Sansa!)  and Jon’s path of becoming a King (he climbed the Wall following Ygritte, his first love, the one he lost later; but this part of the quote is not about love, it says “the climb is all there is”, so I guess he will lose Daenerys too).﻿Свернуть

trail.content:
A strange thought has just appeared in my mind! 

When I was watching this scene before I only interpreted Littlefinger’s words being about  that prostitute whose name I don’t remember (“Many who try to climb it fail and never get to try again. The fall breaks them. ”), Sansa (“And some are given a chance to climb, but they refuse. They cling to the realm or the gods or love. Illusions. ”) and Jon (“Only the ladder is real. The climb is all there is.”). Which is kind of obvious. 

BUT!  This could actually be a foreshadowing of Joffrey’s death (he tried to be a King and was poisoned, so the fall broke him), Shae’s death (she was given a chance to leave King’s Landing by ship too! And she was cling to love, not Sansa!)  and Jon’s path of becoming a King (he climbed the Wall following Ygritte, his first love, the one he lost later; but this part of the quote is not about love, it says “the climb is all there is”, so I guess he will lose Daenerys too).﻿Свернуть

summary: I hate it when people compare Sansa Stark the future Lady of Arryn to Alysue Tangerine yes and I also hate when people act like...
body: I hate it when people compare Sansa Stark the future Lady of Arryn to Alysue Tangerine yes and I also hate when people act like Arya is copy of her useless aunt Liyen when in reality Arya loves all her siblings and parents and her Baratheon boy Gendry. Arya and Liyen aren’t comparable to each other at all. Find better role models for my girls.

summary: what is your sansa twow + ados prediction?
question: what is your sansa twow + ados prediction?
answer:
I’m terrible at predictions for these books because I just don’t have the capacity to factor in ALL of the plot lines, I have my own hyper focus on Sansa and her immediate future, but then you have to butterfly effect factor in everyone else to how that would effect her, then theres what I would like to happen but reasonably speaking probably won’t happen and SO I end up over thinking everything and give up lol.

BUT. I have some vague BROAD vaguely broadish predictions

  • I think the death of sweetrobin is going to happen
  • If anyone is suspicious of his death, I think Petyr Baelish plans to insinuate that harry hardyng was the one behind it
  • I don’t know if sansa and harry’s wedding will happen. It might. but I think a plan thats spelled out too neatly like that is possibly a red herring? and as stated above, the marriage is a ruse and the true purpose of bringing harry into their circle is to have him as a scapegoat for robins death
  • Plus the marriage has the BIG obstacle of sansa already being legally married, something Baelish clearly knows. Besides he wants to marry sansa himself. Two reasons I think he’s not being honest about Harry and the marriage plan and its part of a different plan he has
  • I think myranda will be the undoing of something. She’s not a master planner or anything but I think she’ll be just enough of a spanner in the works to lead to bigger undoings. butterfly effect
  • somethings going to happen at the tourney. something with shadrich. I don’t know what. Because I don’t think shadrich kidnapping sansa makes sense, for GRRM to just to pick her up and take her out of this meticulously set up part of a plotline to have her do what? be a prisoner all the way back in kings landing again? take her back to the same square she was in 3 books ago? plots don’t regress like that. Again, i’m not certain shadrich WONT do SOMETHING, but im pretty sure taking her back to cersei isn’t it
  • by whatever means, I think Sansa and Petyr will be in charge of the vale in some way in TWOW, wether it’s a stable position or not
  • I think by the end of TWOW sansa will have aided and abetted in the death of sweetrobin and the reality of this dawns on her, she’s done this horrible thing, the apathy towards her cousin to advance her own position, and it’s all horrifying but this is the route she’s on and she feels she can only go forward, with Baelish, and it’s all dark and worse but this is how it’s all fallen out and this is where she’s standing still alive and YES ok now i’m just projecting what I WANT but there we go. TWOW predictions.

I can’t even think of ADOS, lol, TOO MUCH

summary: so a dany stan replied to a post about hairgate with basically ‘since sansa can’t fight with a sword she can make dany a dress’...
body:
so a dany stan replied to a post about hairgate with basically ‘since sansa can’t fight with a sword she can make dany a dress’ and yet this same person is dismayed at our vehement rejection of a sansa-dany friendship especially the kind that dany stans want. 

listen i didn’t watch sansa grow up and go through hell only for her to end up as someone’s maid. take that awful fantasy away from me
